name: The Elder Scrolls: Legends - Fall of the Dark Brotherhood
summary: Take on a dangerous mission to infiltrate the elusive, cutthroat ranks of The Dark Brotherhood. As you work to uncover a treacherous plot – and commit a few yourself – in this PvE story expansion, you’ll also discover 40 new cards for your collection, including ruthless creatures with the Slay ability that reap benefits each time they take down a target.
storyline: The Story follows the Forgotten Hero being recruited by the merchant Uther Nere to be his secret agent and infiltrate the ranks of the Dark Brotherhood. Uther states that his daughter killed his wife to join in the ranks of the Dark Brotherhood and asks his agent to find, and kill her.
